pr_title: Test: don't modify defaultConfig on upgrade

timeline.message: Test: don't modify defaultConfig on upgrade

timeline.bodyText: I'm a bit confused. Is the configuration in defaultConfig not needed? ElasticsearchCluster.commonNodeConfig() places a bunch of stuff in there. Won't this change now no longer write those config items to the config file or am I missing something?
timeline.author: mark-vieira

replies.bodyText:
On line 1052 we initialize baseConfig with defaultConfig:
Map<String, String> baseConfig = new HashMap<>(defaultConfig);
replies.author: stu-elastic

replies.bodyText: That's indeed what I was missing.
replies.author: mark-vieira
